I tried in 08a14a02b065, but it didn't work:
~~~
[ 94%] Building CXX object test/cmake/CMakeFiles/REGRESSION_config-cmake.dir/config-cmake.cc.o
In file included from <built-in>:175:
<command line>:4:23: warning: whitespace recommended after macro name
#define GAZEBO_VERSION:STRING 4.1
                      ^
…
test/cmake/config-cmake.cc:25:24: error: expected expression
           SOURCE_DIR, GAZEBO_VERSION);
                       ^
<command line>:4:23: note: expanded from here
~~~
I reverted the change in 7490d2200c0a
